stories.text: If you are self employed and contracting, and need to invest long-term for retirement, what are some of the best brokers to use, and how do you diversify? Do you just get a schwab or vanguard account and buy a fractional ETF and then forget about it for 20 years? Just looking for some personal opinions and experiences here.
stories.title: Ask HN: What are your favourite brokers to manage long term investments?

stories.text:
A friend told me about a map game called "Worldle" so I googled it. No dice. I tried "Worldle map game". Tried in Incognito mode. Even "Wordle reddit" didn't work.

So I went to Duck.com and Bing.com Both pointed to the right site. https://worldle.teuteuf.fr/

Sigh.
stories.title: Try Finding “Worldle” on Google
Concern Rising That Putin Could Use Nuclear Weapons
It’s 2022 and the Magic Mouse still charges from the bottom
Where Does Open Source Fit into Russia’s War with Ukraine?
US Finally Stitches Renewable Energy “Seams” Together

stories.text:
Hi friends, I'm wondering if there is a service (paid or free) that one can easily search through the major newspapers based on criterions.

For example, let's say I want to search all English newspaper in Germany (if there is any) for any news piece that contains "Ukraine" and "NATO", between year 2006 and 2022, what options do I have? I do not live in German btw if it's useful.
stories.title: Ask HN: How to search major newspapers easily?
